channel.description: Recent content in dom on mannuan

item.title: Javascript-DOM中NodeList对象转数组的通用方法
item.description: 举例说明： <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head></head> <body> <ul id="ul"> <li> 123 </li> <li> 456 </li> <li> 789 </li> </ul> </body> <script> var _childNodes = document.getElementById("ul").childNodes; function convertToArray(nodes) { var array = null; try { array = Array.prototype.slice.call(nodes, 0); // 针对非IE浏览器 } catch (ex) { array = new Array(); for (var i = 0, len = nodes.length; i < len; i++) { array.push(nodes[i]); } } return array; } console.log(convertToArray(_childNodes)); </script> </html>
